ygData.subject: Idea for fishing pole and slightly stupid idea
ygData.msgSnippet: First off, I was playing with my ranger earlier today and just had a quick thought, has anyone tried using drawven wire to make the pole?  Second of all, i ve
ygData.messageBody:
First off, I was playing with my ranger earlier today and just had a quick
thought, has anyone tried using drawven wire to make the pole? Second of
all, i've decided to take a slightly more offensive approach then most.
I'm taking my high level character and am going to start killing off NPC's
in and around steamfront. I was think of the Zoo keeper, and that guy
beside the person who sells tinkering components (the one with the pet
spider). Any other suggestions as to who should die?
